BeforeMovie.Text: My, my! My absolute favorite genre. Thank you for inviting me out.$3
Caroline said this movie was frightening! I'll be prepared for any jump scares.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I had a wonderful time. We should see another movie again sometime.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's head in early to get good seats, @.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The story was remarkable and engaging.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I've heard good reviews about this film.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The film was quite the experience. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I have a feeling this film will be a disappointment...$2

Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Dad...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Dad, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Victor! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, Victor. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, Father. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Leaving my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Victor, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, father!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victor's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my father and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

Don't you want to have a successful career?$2"/pause 1350/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1850/shake Olivia 1500/pause 700/speak Olivia "ANSWER ME!$5"/pause 400/speak Victor "I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT I WANTED TO DO!$5"/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Olivia "That's all you have to say for yourself?! After all the money I spent sending you to Pellcar University?...$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Olivia "Victoria, I'm buying a one-bedroom apartment for you in Zuzu City. I'll give you some starting money, and then I'm cutting you off.$0"/pause 300/emote Victor 16/pause 500/shake Victor 1000/pause 500/speak Olivia "You're moving out, Victoria. Now. Maybe being back in the city without my bank account to rely on will inspire you to start living your life.$5"/pause 500/speak Victor "Dad, no! Please, just let me explain! I have a reaso-$7"/speak Olivia "There is nothing to explain, Victoria. This is for your own good.$2"/emote Victor 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/stopMusic/pause 200/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "!!!$7"/pause 200/speed Victor 4/move Victor -1 0 2/speed Victor 4/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 250/speak Victor "@!?$7"/pause 600/speak Olivia "You were eavesdropping on our conversation!?$5"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#I came by to read some of Victoria's books and I heard you two arguing."/fork 2000003_Eavesdropping/end
Entries.2000003_Eavesdropping: pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Victor "Dad. Please. Let me talk so you can understand my side of the story. At least give me that.$2"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1200/speak Olivia "Okay.$2"/pause 750/question fork1 "#Don't say anything#Listen to your dad and move to the city."/fork 2000003_VictorTalk/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 2/emote Victor 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Victor "!!!$7"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Olivia "See, Victoria? Even @ agrees it would be in your best interest to move to Zuzu City.$0#$b#This is the best path to get you out of this slump, Victoria.$0"/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 0/pause 400/shake Victor 700/pause 700/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Olivia "Thank you for your input, @. Victoria and I will continue discussing this matter. Alone. You may leave.$0"/pause 500/emote Victor 28/pause 600/speed farmer 2/move farmer -6 0 3 true/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -1250/end dialogue Victor "Why did you agree with my father about sending me to Zuzu City? It took me hours to talk him down.$2#$b#I'm not just wasting my life here. I'm starting an apprenticeship with a retired bridge builder in Grampleton.$0#$b#I thought you were my friend, but you hurt my feelings and betrayed my trust...$2#$e#Don't talk to me right now, @.$5#$e#%Victoria is now ignoring you."
Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Dad...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Dad, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Victoria! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, Victoria. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, Father. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Leaving my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Victoria, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, father!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victoria's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my father and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harvey gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Oliver, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

Entries.OliviaWine: @,^^The market went my way and I cashed out some of my shares for a huge windfall! To celebrate, I ordered a case of my favorite wine, and I wanted to share a few bottles with you. Let's have a glass together soon!^^  -Oliver %item object 348 5 %%[#]Wine From Oliver
Entries.OliviaCellar: @,^^I wanted to thank you for being such a sweetheart and listening to me the other day. I know I can get a little maudlin when I've had a few glasses. Next time we have a drink, I'll tell you about some of the marvelous places I've visited. It's easy to forget there's a world outside of the valley sometimes, but I have plenty of stories to share.^^  All my love, Oliver[#]A Hard Conversation
Entries.OliviaDatingLetter: @,^^I've been having feelings about our relationship we just started. I need to tell you some things. Can you visit me at my residence when you have a chance?^^  -Oliver[#]Second Feelings
Entries.OliviaPartyLetter: Hello,^^I'm throwing a house party tonight at my residence. Most of the townsfolk will be there, along with my special guest: the governor!! I would absolutely love you to come, @. The party starts at 6:00PM. Don't be late!^^  -Your love, Oliver[#]Oliver's House Party

Entries.Olivia_Text: I wish to host a reception for prestigious guests and friends at the town square. Are there any local farmers who could provide some high-end groceries?       -Oliver
Entries.Olivia_Objective_1_Text: Add wine to Oliver's cabinet in his cellar.
Entries.Olivia_Objective_2_Text: Add cheese to Oliver's cabinet in his cellar.
Entries.Olivia_Objective_3_Text: Add goat cheese to Oliver's cabinet in his cellar.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Olivia: I don't have a single regret about choosing to spend the rest of my life with you, all those years ago.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Olivia 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Olivia "I wish I could show you how I see you through my eyes.$3#$b#If only so you could feel how much you mean to me, and how much I love you.$4

Entries.TwoKids_4: Two kids at once are certainly a lot to manage. I could hardly keep up with them today.$6#$e#I'm not as young as I used to be, @.$2#$b#...I hope that doesn't bother you...$2#$e#%You hug Oliver.#$e#!!!$9
